column1: Does the founder hold an advanced degree from a prestigious institution?
Has the founder previously co-founded a company with a small team?
Has the founder worked full-time at a moderate number of companies?
Does the founder have experience in a leadership role within their industry?
Has the founder's previous startup experience included any acquisitions?
Is the founder based in California?
Does the founder have a background in technology or engineering?
Has the founder received any awards or honors during their education?
Is the founder's personal brand or public presence considered strong?
Has the founder worked in the healthcare sector?
